title: [LFP] [Worlds Mission: Teamwork - Close Combat]
body:
Hi All,

Last mission before I can get Worlds Orb. Need 4 other players to complete this mission.

Worlds Mission: Teamwork - Close Combat: Win a game with no ranged champions on your team.

Add me in-game "D D".

replies.body:
i need it also! add me.
nanolathe11
I need to do it add me nibz328

I'm also looking for a team.
Add me if you want a Kassadin to help you on your quest.
When it says "nor ranged champions" does it mean no adc's or no range at all?
yo have u already done the mission? i still need to do it :/
